Text: Hotel Astoria (Russian: гости́ница «Асто́рия» ) is a five-star hotel in Saint Petersburg, Russia, that first opened in December 1912.

Text: Hotel Astoria (Saint Petersburg):  Hotel Astoria, along with its neighboring sister hotel, Angleterre Hotel, is owned and managed by Rocco Forte Hotels and is a member of The Leading Hotels of the World.
